column4: Traffic;Sihanoukville: Chickens being transported from Kampot fell across the road in Prey Nob
column5: Preah Sihanouk Province. The truck they were on overturned on National Highway 4
column8: Prey Nup district of Preah Vihear province. Sihanouk
column9: at about 10 am on 19 February 2019.------The truck was driven by a 21-year-old male from Dangkor District
column10: Kampot Province. The vehicle was driving too fast and over steered
column11: causing it to tip. Nobody was injured in the incident
column12: and the owner of the truck agreed to repair the damage. ------Rasmei News
